title: A solid xantphos macroligand based on porous organic polymers for the catalytic hydrogenation of CO2
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00164H, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Arne Nisters, Torsten Gutmann, Sun-Myung Kim, Jan Philipp Hofmann, Marcus Rose
A xanthphos-based porous organic polymer enables the support of a molecular ruthenium complex as solid catalyst for the hydrogenation of CO2 to formic acid as renewable platform chemical.
